mapper.select: SELECT s.*, sr.reason, sc.sub_title FROM subject s JOIN sub_instructor si ON s.sub_code = si.sub_code JOIN subject_code sc ON s.sub_code = sc.sub_code LEFT JOIN sub_reject sr ON s.sub_code = sr.sub_code AND s.status = 'N'
select * from subject where sub_title like '%'||#{sub_title}||'%'
